/Header/: This is a demo store. Any orders placed through this store will not be honored or fulfilled.
column2: Ovo je DEMO internet prodavnica. Za vreme test faze narudžbe neće biti obrađene i naručeni artikli neće biti isporučeni.

/Header/: You have no items in your shopping cart.

column2: Ulogujte se ili registrujte nov nalog

/Header/: By creating an account with our store, you will be able to move through the checkout process faster, store multiple shipping addresses, view and track your orders in your account and more.
column2: Registrovanjem naloga u našoj prodavnici svaka naredna kupovina će biti brža, jer će Vaši podaci, adrese i kontakti već biti snimljeni u našoj bazi. Možete snimiti više različitih adresa na koje želite da imate isporuke. Pratićete status svake Vaše narudžbe u okviru posebne stranice sa Vašim nalogom i podacima. Vaš nalog je dostupan u svakom momentu. Svi podaci su sigurni i u potpunosti se poštuje Vaša privatnost. Uvek ih možete promeniti, kao i druge razne opcije koje se nude u okviru Vašeg naloga.

/Header/: If you have an account with us, please log in.
column2: Ukoliko imate registrovan nalog, unesite potrebne podatke.

/Header/: Please enter a valid email address. For example johndoe@domain.com.
column2: Unesite email adresu u odgovarajućem formatu. Npr.  johndoe@domain.com.

/Header/: Please enter 6 or more characters. Leading or trailing spaces will be ignored.
column2: Unesite 6 ili više karaktera. Prazna mesta će biti ignorisana.

/Header/: Please make sure your passwords match.
Please enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
column2: Molimo Vas da unesete Vašu email adresu sa kojom ste registrovali nalog. Na tu adresu ćemo poslati link za resetovanje Vaše šifre.
Hvala Vam što ste registrovali nalog kod nas.

/Header/: The account information has been saved.
An error occurred while saving your subscription.
column2: Za vreme snimanja Vaše prijave došlo je do greške. Molimo Vas da pokušate ponovo.

/Header/: You have logged out and will be redirected to our homepage in %s seconds.
column2: Sada ste odlogovani i za %s sekundi će se otvoriti početna stranica.

/Header/: From your My Account Dashboard you have the ability to view a snapshot of your recent account activity and update your account information. Select a link below to view or edit information.
column2: Na stranici 'Moj Nalog' možete pratiti statuse Vaših narudžbi, izvršiti pregled Vaših nedavnih aktivnosti u Internet prodavnici i po potrebi promeniti Vaše podatke.

/Header/: You are currently not subscribed to any newsletter.
column2: Trenutno niste prijavljeni na listu za primenje newsletter-a.

/Header/: You are currently subscribed to 'General Subscription'.
column2: Trenutno ste prijavljeni na listu za primenje newsletter-a.

/Header/: You have no additional address entries in your address book.
column2: Niste uneli dodatne adrese u Vaš adresar.

/Header/: You have no items in your wishlist.
column2: Nemate ubačenih artikala u Listu Želja.

/Header/: You have not set a default billing address.
column2: Niste uneli osnovnu adresu za naplatu.

/Header/: You have not set a default shipping address.
column2: Niste uneli osnovnu adresu za isporuku.

/Header/: Your inquiry was submitted and will be responded to as soon as possible. Thank you for contacting us.
column2: Vaš upit je poslat i biće odgovoreno u najkraćem mogućem roku. Hvala što ste nas kontaktirali.

/Header/: You have no items to compare.
Are you sure you would like to remove this item from the compare products?
column2: Da li ste sigurni da želite da uklonite ovaj artikal iz liste za poređenje?

/Header/: Are you sure you would like to remove all products from your comparison?
column2: Da li ste sigurni da želite da uklonite sve artikle iz liste za poređenje?

/Header/: Other people marked this product with these tags:
column2: Drugi posetioci dodelili su ovom artiklu sledeće tagove:

/Header/: Use spaces to separate tags. Use single quotes (') for phrases.
column2: Koristi taster space za razdvajanje više tagova. Koristi apostrof (') za fraze od više reči.

/Header/: There are no search terms available.
column2: Trenutno ne postoje fraze za prikaz.

/Header/: There are no products matching the selection.
column2: Trenutno ne postoje artikli za prikaz.

/Header/: The product %s has been added to comparison list.
column2: %s je dodat(a) u listu za poređenje.

/Header/: The product %s has been removed from comparison list.
column2: %s je uklonjen(a) iz liste za poređenje.
Uklonjeni su svi artikli iz liste za poređenje.
Nisu pronađeni rezultati pretrage. Pokušajte ponovo sa drugačijim upitom.

/Header/: The requested quantity for "%s" is not available.
Double click on above image to view full picture
column2: Za veliku sliku klikni dva puta na sliku iznad

/Header/: Check items to add to the cart or
column2: Odaberite artikal pojedinačno za dodatak korpi, ili

/Header/: Sorry, there was an error getting requested content.
Total of %d record(s) were successfully updated
Unable to find item to save
Are you sure you would like to remove this item from the shopping cart?
column2: Da li ste sigurni da želite da uklonite ovaj artikal iz korpe?

/Header/: %s was added to your shopping cart.
There is 1 item in your cart.
column2: Imate 1 proizvod u Vašoj korpi.

/Header/: There are %s items in your cart.
column2: Imate %s proizvoda u Vašoj korpi.
Potrebno je da unesete Vašu email adresu i šifru.

/Header/: Create an account for later use
Please transfer the money within %s days to the following bank account
column2: Molimo Vas da uplatite traženi iznos na sledeći žiro račun, rezervacija važi %s radna dana

/Header/: You will receive an order confirmation email with details of your order and a link to track its progress.
column2: Na Vašu email adresu primićete email sa detaljima za narudžbu i link na kome možete pratiti njen status.
